#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Marsa Matruh
#Text=Marsa Matruth ( also spelled : Mersa ... ; Arabic : مرسى مطروح marsa màTrūH ) is a coastal town in the western part of Lower Egypt .
#Text=Climate
#Text=Marsa
#Text=Matruh has the coolest summer day temperatures of any other city or resort in Egypt .
#Text=It is known for its light colored sands and clear beach water .
#Text=By bus
#Text=The West Delta Bus Station is the city 's main transportation hub and is located on the town 's main square .
#Text=Buses plying the Marsa Matruh - Alexandria route leave three times daily at 7AM , 5PM and 10pm .
#Text=Booking ahead is well advised .
#Text=The most convenient way to reach Marsa Matruh from Cairo is to catch the 7:30AM West Delta Bus from the city 's Turgoman Bus Station to Marsa Matruh .
#Text=This should arrive in time to make 1:30PM planes .
#Text=From Alexandria , the fastest route is take a West Delta Bus to Marsa Matruh .
#Text=By taxi
#Text=There is no official shared taxi service in Marsa Matruh , but sheruts leave from in front of Abdu 's Restaurant ( across from the Yousef Hotel ) in the early evening .
#Text=Confirming in advance is highly recommended .
#Text=By bicycle
#Text=Bicycles are the best way to explore Marsa Matruh and surroundings , and Chinese gear-less models can be rented for 10LE per day ( 5LE half day ) .
#Text=Before accepting a bike , however , check that it is sturdy , that the brakes are functioning well and that the handle bars are not cracked or bent .
#Text=Note that driving on sand covered streets can be quite a challenge for inexperienced cyclists .
#Text=By donkey cart
#Text=Donkey cart drivers are mostly children who have learned the trade from very young .
#Text=Prices for this mode of transport are negotiable , and run from around 3LE for a short trip within the downtown up to 30LE for longer journeys .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Siwa
#Text=Dates
#Text=are the best in Egypt , and perhaps the whole world .
#Text=Apart from regular dates , they are also sold stuffed with almonds and chocolate .
#Text=Look for shops handling dates , and prices range from around 7 to 8 LE for a 500 gram box .
#Text=Stroll the beach and eat a large variety of vendor offerings .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=Jaz Almaza Beach Resort .
#Text=Five star all inclusive resort , 35 km from Marsa Matruh
#Text=Stay safe
#Text=As a very conservative and traditional town , Marsa Matruh is extremely safe .

#Text=There is no risk of theft or physical violence as long as travelers behave according to expected norms , which in Marsa Matruh includes not communicating with local women as doing so is considered a rude and hostile act .
#Text=Respect
#Text=Women are not allowed to wear clothes that reveal the shoulders , breasts or legs .
#Text=Displays of affection in public are prohibited .
#Text=Alcohol cannot be consumed publicly .
#Text=Male travelers should avoid contact with local women .
